channel.title: Comments on: Barbaric Bread
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Orderâ„¢

item.title: By: James
item.dc:creator: James
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/shop/barbaric-bread/#comment-31056">Tyrone</a>.
Hello Tyrone, We regret to hear that this has been your experience. We have been forced to reformulate this recipe because the gingerbread concentrate that we were using now includes some additives that are not in compliance with our quality control standards. We have been experimenting with different concentrates in the hope of finding an adequate replacement for the gingerbread we were using, and your feedback is very helpful to us in this process. In exchange for your troubles, and also for your valuable and candid feedback, please email support[at]cloudchemistry.co, and we will be happy to comp a replacement bottle of the blend of your choice. Thank you so much for your patronage.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tyrone.

Hello Tyrone, We regret to hear that this has been your experience. We have been forced to reformulate this recipe because the gingerbread concentrate that we were using now includes some additives that are not in compliance with our quality control standards. We have been experimenting with different concentrates in the hope of finding an adequate replacement for the gingerbread we were using, and your feedback is very helpful to us in this process. In exchange for your troubles, and also for your valuable and candid feedback, please email support[at]cloudchemistry.co, and we will be happy to comp a replacement bottle of the blend of your choice. Thank you so much for your patronage.

item.title: By: Tyrone
item.dc:creator: Tyrone
item.description: This use to be my favorite flavor. It seems like the blend has changed and has too much cinnamon and not enough of the gingerbread taste. I will not be getting this any more.
item.content:encoded: This use to be my favorite flavor. It seems like the blend has changed and has too much cinnamon and not enough of the gingerbread taste. I will not be getting this any more.
